The large warehouse belonging to the Govt known as the "Red Barracks” situated at Minet id Bassal near the Gabbari Goods Station and .hi the Bank of the Mahmoudieh Canal will be fibred for sale by public auction at the lovemorate of Alexandria on May 25th 1905 between the hours of 9 a m. and noon. The building occupies an Area of over 18,000 mj. metres. The upset price for the land and buildings is £25,000. The building is open to inspevtion by the Public every day from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. Plans and specifications may be scoti at the Ministry of Finance, Government Lands Offibe, or at th'e Govornorate of Alexandria. For further information apply to H.E. the Governor of Alexandria. 25950 6-1 Private discount (3 month bills) Bar Silver (per os d.).. ... ... Consols (June) .. ... ... ... SUDAN GOVERNMENT. POSTS AND TELEGRAPHS DEPARTMENT. NOTICE Tenders will be received at the Office of the Director of Poets and Telegraphs, Khartoum, up to 12 noon on Thursday the 1st June 1905 for the purchase of the following Postage Stamps(defaced) Sumps faces raids »boot SE. MO. COO aim BxjpUu „ „ „ „ , „ 1100. 000 m’m foreign .. „ ......... „ >00. 000 m/m Persons wishing to tender can consult the Specification at the above Office any day from 9 a. m. to 1 p. m. except Fridays and General Holidays.

Tenders must be submitted on stamped pa- per : they should btfaMressed to the Direotor of Poets and Telegraph* m a.seated envelope bearing the inscription '•Teuadn for purchase of Obliterated Sudan Postage Stamps.” The above Sudan Stamps can also be ob- tained in complete seta at the rate of 50 m/m a set but not less than four seta ban be sold. The Director of Post* aud Telegraphs does not bind himself to aoo pt the highest or any tender. (Signed) H. L Mackworth, Bimb., E A. Asst-Director of Posts and Telegraphs. Dans oette seconde reunion les deliberations seront valablement prises quel que soit le nom- bre des actions representes. Ordre do Jour

En Egypte : Cinq jours au moins avant le jour de la reunion, soitle 17 Mai au plus tard: au Siige Social, au Caire, k la Strooufgale, k Alexandria, aux Agences de la Banque k Assiout, As- souan, Benba, Beni-Souef, Chibin-El-Kom, Damanhour, Payoute, Keufih, Mansourah, Minieh, Port-SaW, Sohag, Tantah, Zagazig et Mouski (Caire) 1 an Caire ".SoTSp? Parcels not exceeding 25 kilogrammes will be accepted at Bab el Louk Station for delivery anywhere in Helouan provided they are dearly addressed, safely packed and the sender signs a special forwarding note. An extra charge of 10 milliemes per parcel will be made for delivery and the Company's liability is limited to L.E 1 for each parcel 25941-4-3 Allen, Alderson & Co. XjHaiteix
